information: The company ETS BERGUE SARL, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1988, which operates in the Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment industry. It also operates in the Livestock raising - machinery and equipment, Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment, Tractors and trailers, agricultural, and Agricultural systems and equipment industries. It is based in La Chapelle Au Riboul, France.
